text: "Bedrock Anthem" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "Under the Bridge" and "Give it Away" by the Red Hot Chili Peppers. It is about the narrator who desires to live in Bedrock, the setting of the cartoon The Flintstones. It states several reasons referring to the show. It was released on the 1993 album Alapalooza. ==References== Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:1993 songs
title: Bedrock Anthem
